page.title: 14PENROSE AND TREBURRICK
page.content:
I interviewed 3 people in Penrose about religion. These are the facts that I found out: l goes to church at Rumford Methodist, 2 are Baptists. All three believe in being baptised. two have been baptised and they were baptised when they were babies.
I interviewed 3 people in Treburrick about religion. These are the facts that I found out: 2 go to church at St.Eval Parish, 1 is a Baptist, 2 are Church of England. All three believe in being baptised. All of them have been baptised. 1 was baptised as a baby,2 were baptised as teenagers.
